About Us

We offer a complete home solution for our customers. Dating back to 1985 when “Furniturezone.pk former known as Mian Hanif Woodworks and Carpenters – The complete home furniture solution producers”. he has served the home decor industry with his expertise in furniture production in Pakistan, it has been a long road and we are just getting started. By wisely selecting high quality merchandise locally to be available for the public of Pakistan, we can assure true customer loyalty. To provide quality products and services that remain competitive and cost-effective while exceeding industry standards.

Know About

Company History

The company was formed to offer a complete home store that offers superior quality and value for money to the people of Pakistan. Our team makes sure to provide the highest quality customer service experience so you’ll always be excited to come back. Customer loyalty means more than building a customer database. We’re glad to see the number of our customers continuously increase since we’ve started.

Our premium

Brand Mentions

We are proud to showcase the recognition and support of industry leaders who have featured us on their website. From Zaubee to Lahore industry, Local Small Businesses, and especially Urdu point, these brands have recognized the value and quality of our products/services. This is a testament to our commitment to excellence and solidifies our position as a trusted leader in the industry.

 

Our gallery

Our Recent Projects

A huge base of loyal customers remains the core of furniturezone.pk‘s focus. We provide comprehensive after-sales services to all our retail and business customers to ensure satisfaction at every level.
